tool_description: IMDB API provides a comprehensive set of endpoints to retrieve detailed information about movies, TV series, and user-generated reviews. Access up-to-date details on titles, reviews, seasons, and user profiles through a simple and efficient interface.
name: IMDB API
title: IMDB API

api_list.name: Fetch a User's Ratings and Reviews
api_list.description:
Get a user's ratings and reviews with optional filtering and sorting.
possible values for filter and sort :    

ratingFilter={1-10}&sort={most_recent|oldest|top_rated|worst_rated}

Example: /user/ur82525142/ratings?ratingFilter=5&sort=most_recent

api_list.name: Fetch a User's Info
api_list.description: Retrieve information about a specific user.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://imdb-api12.p.rapidapi.com/user/ur82525142"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "imdb-api12.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://imdb-api12.p.rapidapi.com/user/{user_id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "imdb-api12.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Fetch a Single Season of a Series
api_list.description: Fetch details of a specific season for a TV series.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://imdb-api12.p.rapidapi.com/title/tt6522580/season/2"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "imdb-api12.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://imdb-api12.p.rapidapi.com/title/{imdb_id}/season/{season_id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "imdb-api12.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Reviews of a Title
api_list.description:
Obtain reviews for a title with various sorting and filtering options.

possible values for option and sortOrder:

/reviews/{imdb_id}?option={helpfulness|date|votes|rating}&sortOrder={asc|desc}

Example: /reviews/tt1234567?option=date&sortOrder=desc

api_list.name: Get Title Details by ID
api_list.description: Retrieve detailed information about a specific movie or TV series.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://imdb-api12.p.rapidapi.com/title/tt0087884"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "imdb-api12.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://imdb-api12.p.rapidapi.com/title/{imdb_id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "imdb-api12.p.rapidapi.com"

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Search Titles by Title
api_list.description: Search for movie titles based on the provided query.
